scripts.test: SKIP_URL_CHECK=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 npx cucumber-js src/tests/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require src/tests/step_definitions/homepage.steps.ts --require src/tests/step_definitions/login.steps.ts --require src/tests/support/hooks.ts --require src/tests/support/custom-world.ts --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --publish-quiet
scripts.test:no-autostart: SKIP_URL_CHECK=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 AUTO_START_FRONTEND=false npx cucumber-js src/tests/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require src/tests/step_definitions/homepage.steps.ts --require src/tests/step_definitions/login.steps.ts --require src/tests/support/hooks.ts --require src/tests/support/custom-world.ts --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --publish-quiet
scripts.test:generate-report: SKIP_URL_CHECK=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 AUTO_START_FRONTEND=true npx cucumber-js src/tests/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require src/tests/step_definitions/homepage.steps.ts --require src/tests/step_definitions/login.steps.ts --require src/tests/support/hooks.ts --require src/tests/support/custom-world.ts --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --format html:reports/cucumber-report.html --publish-quiet
scripts.test:debug: SKIP_URL_CHECK=true NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 --inspect AUTO_START_FRONTEND=true npx cucumber-js src/tests/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require src/tests/step_definitions/homepage.steps.ts --require src/tests/step_definitions/login.steps.ts --require src/tests/support/hooks.ts --require src/tests/support/custom-world.ts --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --publish-quiet
scripts.test:with-server: NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 AUTO_START_FRONTEND=true npx cucumber-js src/tests/features/*.feature --require-module ts-node/register/transpile-only --require src/tests/step_definitions/homepage.steps.ts --require src/tests/step_definitions/login.steps.ts --require src/tests/support/hooks.ts --require src/tests/support/custom-world.ts --format @cucumber/pretty-formatter --publish-quiet
